summary: A letter from UBS Group AG to the FBI responding to a grand jury subpoena dated August 16, 2019, regarding Ghislaine Maxwell. UBS provides account records, wire transfers, and correspondence, with email correspondence pending. The letter requests confidentiality and advance notice of any disclosure.

persons.name: Mark Lubin
persons.context: Addressed as the recipient of the letter from UBS regarding the subpoena response; the FBI agent handling the request.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subpoena referenced in the letter is issued in relation to her, indicating she is under investigation.

events.title: Grand Jury Subpoena Issued to UBS
events.description: A grand jury subpoena was issued to UBS Financial Services, Inc. requesting information and documentation related to Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Telephone Agreement on Subpoena Response
events.description: A telephone call between UBS and the FBI (Mr. Mark Lubin) where they agreed on the scope of documents to be produced to satisfy the subpoena.

events.title: UBS Subpoena Response Letter Sent
events.description: UBS sends a letter to the FBI enclosing a CD with account records, wire transfers, and non-email correspondence in response to the subpoena, with email correspondence pending.

locations: Federal Bureau of Investigation, 26 Federal Plaza, New York, NY 10278
UBS Group AG, 1285 Avenue of the Americas, 12th Floor, New York, NY 10019
keyFacts: A grand jury subpoena was issued to UBS Financial Services, Inc. on August 16, 2019, seeking information related to Ghislaine Maxwell.
UBS produced account records, copies of Federal Fund Wires, and non-email correspondence on a password-protected CD, with email correspondence still pending.
The letter emphasizes UBS's request for confidentiality and advance notice before any disclosure of the provided documents.
The response indicates an ongoing financial investigation into Ghislaine Maxwell's activities through her banking records.
